column2: Slightly lethargic, had tumor beginning to ulcerate in ear. A cluster of tumors was nestled in between and around shoulder blades.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, heart, lungs, spleen, kidneys, liver, tumor
Large nodule on one of lungs (doesn't have popcorn lung appearance)
Cluster of tumors around shoulders and one ulcerating in ear.
